entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:54 a.m. MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.7Â°C

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except east 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except east 90 gusting to 120 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 22.
